page.title: 06Games in the playground.
page.content:
"I play football at playtime. We play at the side of the school. There are about 7 on each side. I play with the big boys. Sometimes I play tiggy, we run round the climbing frame. Simon is on most of the time, because he is not very fast".{ Michael, aged 9
"I like playing Dracula's Castle. You must have two people to play it because you have to pretend to go into a castle and hear spooky noises. Then we pretend to go upstairs and that we hear Dracula chasing us. We pretend to go into a room and lock the door. Sometimes we get caught. I like this game because it is exciting". { Helen, aged 8
"At dinner time I walk round with the dinner lady". {Joanne, aged 9
